sentences.en: A doctor is there to treat and to cure, not to dismiss anyone as a hopeless case.
sentences.cn: 医生的职责是治病救人，任何人都不能被看作是无药可救而打发走。

sentences.en: As a matter of fact, she was in a most hopeless quandary.
sentences.cn: 事实上, 她正陷入进退两难的困境.

sentences.en: Getting your work published often seems a hopeless task .
sentences.cn: 想让自己的作品出版似乎总是徒劳的。

sentences.en: Getting your work published often seems a hopeless task.
sentences.cn: 想让自己的作品出版似乎总是徒劳的。

sentences.en: He gave way to hopeless grief as soon as he heard the bad message.
sentences.cn: 一听到那个坏消息,他立即陷入绝望的境地.

sentences.en: He was disappointed so often that he became hopeless.
sentences.cn: 他屡次失望,以致变为了绝望.

sentences.en: I began to feel lonely and hopeless.
sentences.cn: 我开始感到寂寞绝望。

sentences.en: I don't believe your situation is as hopeless as you think. If you love each other, you'll work it out.
sentences.cn: 我认为你们的情况并不像你想的那样无望。如果你们彼此相爱，总会找到解决办法的。

sentences.en: I don't drive and the buses are quite hopeless.
sentences.cn: 我不开车，公共汽车条件又太糟糕。

sentences.en: I kept on struggling forward, even though I knew it was hopeless .
sentences.cn: 虽然知道无望，我还是奋力挣扎向前。

sentences.en: I kept on struggling forward, even though I knew it was hopeless.
sentences.cn: 虽然知道无望，我还是奋力挣扎向前。

sentences.en: I knew I was going to make it — that I wasn't a hopeless case.
sentences.cn: 我就知道自己能挺过去——我还没到山穷水尽的地步。

sentences.en: I'd be hopeless at working for somebody else.
sentences.cn: 要是让我为别人工作，我一定做不好。

sentences.en: I'm hopeless at Maths.
sentences.cn: 我的数学很糟糕.

sentences.en: Ian was a hopeless innocent where women were concerned.
sentences.cn: 一涉及女性，伊恩就显得极其无知。

sentences.en: It's hopeless trying to convince her.
sentences.cn: 想说服她简直是徒劳。

sentences.en: She'sin a hopeless situation.
sentences.cn: 她已经无可救药。

sentences.en: The sight of the hopeless little boy aroused her maternal instincts.
sentences.cn: 那个绝望的小男孩的模样唤起了她的母性.

sentences.en: The situation is pretty hopeless.
sentences.cn: 这局面叫人感到相当绝望.

sentences.en: We tried to stop the flames from spreading, but we knew it was hopeless.
sentences.cn: 我们试图阻止火势蔓延，但我们知道这是不可能的。

sentences.en: When I was at school I was always hopeless at athletics.
sentences.cn: 我上学的时候体育十分糟糕.

words.tran_cn: 绝望地；无望地；无可救药地

trans.tran_cn: 不抱希望的，无望的，无能的，糟糕透顶的
trans.tran_en: if something that you try to do is hopeless, there is no possibility of it being successful
